result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Aja Laverne Isham

defendant.name: Isham, Aja Laverne
defendant.address: 2855 Ogdan Woods Drive, Green Bay, WI 54313

records.addlTxt:
Asst. District Attorney Kevin Greene appears on behalf of the State. Defendant Aja Laverne Isham in court, in custody.  Attorney Charles Donald Wingrove in court for Aja Laverne Isham. Defendant pleads not guilty to both counts. Defense requests $1,000.00 cash bond. State objects. Court denies. Present bond continued
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 29, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant's Motion for Reduction of Bail
Bail/bond hearing on October 31, 2022 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Aja Laverne Isham in court, in custody at Brown County jail.  Attorney Charles Donald Wingrove in court for Aja Laverne Isham.  Prosecuting attorney Kevin Charles Greene in court for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant/attorney waives right to Preliminary Hearing and files waiver form with Court.
Court accepts waiver and orders defendant bound over to assigned branch.
Information to be filed.
Defense addresses bond. State objects. Court denies bond modification.
Bond continued.
Arraignment scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Defendant's Motion for Reduction of Bail

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Aja Laverne Isham appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney C. Wingrove appears, via zoom, on behalf of the defendant.
Prosecuting attorney Natalie M. Mulvey appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defense argues bond; State opposes any change; court denies request to modify bond.
Present bond continued
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 29, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Absolute sobriety. 
Defendant to report to CJS within 24 hours of court or release from custody. 
Defendant to have no contact with Walmart Stores.
Pharma Patch to be installed prior to release.

Defendant Aja Laverne Isham in court, in custody.  Attorney Brianna Zawada in court for Aja Laverne Isham.  Prosecuting attorney Kevin L Steuck in court for the State of Wisconsin. All parties appear via zoom.
Bond arguments reserved.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 16, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
